TextJPN: ご注意。@rこの後に流れるオープニングアニメーションは、@r本編のネタバレを多く含んでいます。@rまた、昼壊し編の元になった「ひぐらしデイブレイク」が@r出典となる為、一部内容が異なりますのです。@rご了承くださいなのですよ、にぱー☆
TextENG: Warning.@rThis is a gag chapter.@rYou will be given an option to skip this chapter@rand mark it as finished so You can continue@rplaying next chapters if you wish.@rContinuing playing this chapter will result@rin showing Higurashi Daybreak opening that@rcontains spoilers about next chapters.@rHirukowashi-hen itself doesn't contain@rspoilers, so to avoid revealing plot twists@rit is recommended to skip opening@rin case of continuing playing this chapter.@rYou have been warned, nipah☆

TextJPN: 「るーるん、るんたったー、るんたった～♪」
TextENG: ``Ru ru, ru ta-ta, run-ta-ta~ ♪``

TextJPN: 「そのご機嫌具合から見て、例のダム現場にまた新しいゴミ山でもできたんだろう」
TextENG: ``You're in a good mood. You found a new pile of trash at the dam site, didn't you?``

TextJPN: 「うん、そうなの～！@k@vS07/02/330200003.　新しい山には何が埋まってるのかな！@k@vS07/02/330200004.　かぁいいお宝の予感～！@k@vS07/02/330200005.　帰ったらね、すぐに宝探しに行くんだよー！@k@vS07/02/330200006.　圭一くんも一緒に来ないかな、かな！」
TextENG: ``Yep, that's right~!@k@vS07/02/330200003. I wonder what's buried in the new pile!@k@vS07/02/330200004. I predict I'll find a kyute little treasure~!@k@vS07/02/330200005. After I get home, I'm going straight there for treasure-hunting!@k@vS07/02/330200006. Keiichi-kun, wanna come too? Wanna come?``

TextJPN: 「俺かー？@k@vS07/01/330100003.　うーん、魅音に借りた漫画、まだ全巻読み終わってないんだよなぁ」
TextENG: ``Who, me?@k@vS07/01/330100003. Hmm... I still haven't finished all the comics Mion lent me.``

TextJPN: 「う～、女の子が誘ってるのに、圭一くんは漫画を選ぶんだね…、はぅ。@k@vS07/02/330200008.…今日の部活で助け舟を出してあげたのにそのご恩返しがこれなんだね…」
TextENG: ``Uu~ A girl invites you out, but you'd rather read comics... Hau.@k@vS07/02/330200008. ...This is what I get for helping a friend in need during club today, huh...``

TextJPN: 「ううう、ウソですごめんなさい、宝探し万歳です！@k@vS07/01/330100005.　ぜひレナさんの旅に同行させてくださいませ！！」
TextENG: ``N-N-No, I'm sorry, I lied! I'm all for treasure hunting!@k@vS07/01/330100005. Please, allow this one to accompany you on your journey, Rena-san!!``

TextJPN: ……部活は非情の一言に尽きる。自分こそ優勝！　そして弱ったヤツは徹底的に叩きのめしビリを確定させる。
TextENG: ...Club activities today could be summed up as ``heartless.`` Every man for himself! Anyone showing weakness was crushed and dropped into last place.

TextJPN: 俺だって優勢の時は徹底的に蹴落とすし、逆ならとことん蹴落とされる。
TextENG: I would gladly romp people at an advantage, and be romped when the roles were reversed.

TextJPN: 今日の俺はどうにも運に見放され、ことごとく大勝負が裏目に出た。
TextENG: But today, luck just wasn't in my favor, and the deciding match completely backfired on me.

TextJPN: …そこに、ちょっとした助け舟を出してくれたのがレナだったわけだ。
TextENG: ...That was when Rena had given me a little help.

TextJPN: 「でも、結果的にビリだったね。@k@vS07/02/330200010.あははは、罰ゲーム、今度の日曜日が楽しみかな、かな！」
TextENG: ``But you ended up in last anyway.@k@vS07/02/330200010. Ahahaha, the punishment game is this Sunday, and I can't wait! Can't wait!``

TextJPN: 「……うぅうぅ、レナにあれだけ助けてもらってこのザマとは…。@k@vS07/01/330100007.不甲斐ないぜ…」
TextENG: ``...Uuuu, you helped me so much, and now look at me...@k@vS07/01/330100007. I'm worthless...``

TextJPN: 結局、レナの助け舟を活かすことはできず、俺のビリは確定した。
TextENG: In the end, I couldn't put Rena's help to good use, and that locked me in last place.

TextJPN: …でも、レナのお陰で、起死回生の最後の大勝負に挑戦できたのは間違いない。
TextENG: ...But it was definitely thanks to her that I could even try going for that big, deciding match to turn things around.

TextJPN: レナが助けてくれなかったら、その最後の勝負すら挑めないくらいの大負けだったのだから。
TextENG: If she hadn't helped me out, I would have lost even worse, without even having that opportunity.

TextJPN: レナに、俺をビリから救済する義理はなかった。一位が望めないとわかったら、せめてビリだけは回避したいと普通なら考える。
TextENG: Rena didn't have any responsibility to try and rescue me. Normally, you'd decide that if you couldn't hope for first, you could at least avoid last.

TextJPN: 放っておけば俺のビリは確定するのに、それを救済するのはリスクばかりで何の得にもならないはず。
TextENG: If she left me alone, it would have assured my last-place finish. She wouldn't gain anything from saving me aside from risk to herself, would she?

TextJPN: なのに、レナは助けてくれたのだ。
TextENG: And yet she'd helped me anyway.

TextJPN: ……部活という非情の世界において、そのやさしさのカケラは、地獄に仏さまの後光が届くような神々しさだ。
TextENG: ...That fragment of kindness in the world of our cold, heartless club was sublime, as though the Buddha's nimbus had reached me in hell.

TextJPN: 情け容赦なく戦うのが部活の掟。
TextENG: The one rule of our club was to fight without pity or mercy.

TextJPN: でも、その中にあっても、やさしさを失わず、みんなで楽しくゲームをして遊ぼうという気持ちを失わないのがレナだった。
TextENG: But even amidst that... Rena was the one who always held onto her kindness. She wants everyone to have a good time playing games.

TextJPN: 「あはははは、買いかぶりすぎだよぅ。@k@vS07/02/330200012.…レナはワンサイドゲームって嫌いなだけ。@k@vS07/02/330200013.だって、どう戦っても逆転がないってわかったら、誰だって不貞腐れちゃうもん」
TextENG: ``Ahahahaha, you think too highly of me.@k@vS07/02/330200012. ...Rena just hates one-sided games.@k@vS07/02/330200013. I mean, anyone would get sulky if they knew they couldn't make a comeback no matter how hard they fought.``

TextJPN: 「ま、まぁなぁ。@k@vS07/01/330100009.…罰ゲームは俺に確定だってんで、決着を待たずに服の採寸までされてたからなぁ…。@k@vS07/01/330100010.あぁクソ、一体何の服の採寸なんだろぅなぁ…、トホホホ…」
TextENG: ``W-Well, I guess.@k@vS07/01/330100009. ...After all, once I was locked in for the punishment game, they started taking my clothing measurements without waiting for the end...@k@vS07/01/330100010. Ah, crap, what the heck did they need them for...? Sob...``

TextJPN: 「どんな逆境からでも、いつだって逆転はできると思うの。@k@vS07/02/330200015.……うぅん、そういう世界じゃないといけない。@k@vS07/02/330200016.だからね、レナは、どうしても困ってる人に、その、チャンスを与えずにはいられないの」
TextENG: ``I think you can always make a comeback, no matter how bad it gets.@k@vS07/02/330200015. ...Or, more like, that's how the world should be.@k@vS07/02/330200016. That's why Rena can't help but give a chance to people who are up a creek without a paddle.``

TextJPN: 「………レナは本当にやさしいんだな。@k@vS07/01/330100012.…なんて話を聞かされると、レナが弱り目の時、容赦なく叩いてきた俺に良心の呵責が……、ううぅ！」
TextENG: ``......Rena, you're such a nice person.@k@vS07/01/330100012. ...When you were weak, I knocked you out without mercy, so hearing this pricks my conscience... Uuu!``

TextJPN: 「あははは、レナが好きでやってるんだから、圭一くんまでそうしてなんて言わないよぅ。@k@|@y@vS07/02/330200018.でもその、レナがピンチになった時はその、…貸しを返してくれるとうれしいかな、かな！」
TextENG: ``Ahahaha, Rena does it because she wants to. I'm not telling you to do it too.@k@|@y@vS07/02/330200018. But, well, when Rena is in a pinch... She'd be really happy if you repaid the favor! She would be!``

TextJPN: 「おう！@k@vS07/01/330100014.　今日のは借りにしとくぜー！@k@vS07/01/330100015.　まぁ、それとは別でだ。@k@vS07/01/330100016.たまにはレナの宝探しに付き合ってやるぜ。@k@vS07/01/330100017.じゃあ、ダム現場のゴミ山に集合でいいな？」
TextENG: ``Right!@k@vS07/01/330100014. I owe you one for today!@k@vS07/01/330100015. Well, aside from that.@k@vS07/01/330100016. I'll go treasure hunting with you once in a while.@k@vS07/01/330100017. Let's meet up at the dam site?``

TextJPN: 「うん！@k@vS07/02/330200020.　ダム現場の宝の山に集合ねー！！」
TextENG: ``Okay!@k@vS07/02/330200020. Let's meet at the treasure mountain!!``

TextJPN: レナはとびきりの笑顔で答えると、ぶんぶんと腕を振りながら駆けて行った…。
TextENG: After answering with a wide smile, Rena ran off, waving her arm...
